metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3835 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow in usb device class. Zephyr versions >= v2.6.0 contain Heap-based Buffer Overflow (CWE-122). For more information, see https://github.com/zephyrproject-rtos/zephyr/security/advisories/GHSA-fm6v-8625-99jf

criterions.comment: zephyr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
